description: Whoah there little Bugblins! You don't wanna run too fast now do ya?! Of course ya do! Now go get em full run hahaha!
tooltip: Whoah there little Bugblins! You don't wanna run too fast now do ya?! Of course ya do! Now go get em full run hahaha! (Bugblin Baddy Rams move 25% faster and gain +25 more HP)
